projects.name: PregChat App
projects.description: A pregnancy companion app that provides daily updates based on the user's pregnancy day, detailing both baby growth and mother's health.
features: Prompt user for pregnancy day input
Daily updates for baby growth and mother's health
Modern UI built with React and SCSS
Express + MongoDB backend with RESTful API

projects.name: Blade & Bourbon
projects.description: A premium barbershop website offering classic grooming services with a modern digital booking experience.
features: Online booking system with calendar integration
Responsive modern UI with dark luxury theme
